title: Run FO-04 E2E test until passing
description:
Execute the FO-04 E2E test and fix any issues until it passes.

Commands:
1. Start dev server: npm run dev
2. Run test: node --import tsx e2e/fo-04.test.ts

Debug process:
- Run with headless: false to watch the test
- Take screenshots on failures
- Check for timing issues with AI generation (increase timeouts if needed)
- Verify all selectors match actual rendered elements

Fix issues in components, actions, or test file as needed.
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-04.test.ts passes with all test scenarios green
closed_reason: E2E test passing - fixed chip selection timing issue: re-fetch chips after each selection and increased wait time for animation
